title: WP_REST_API_Block_Directory_Item
description: A block directory search result in a REST API context.

name.description: The block name, in namespace/block-name format.

title.description: The block title, in human readable format.

description.description: A short description of the block, in human readable format.

rating.description: The star rating of the block.

active_installs.description: The number sites that have activated this block.

author_block_rating.description: The average rating of blocks published by the same author.

author_block_count.description: The number of blocks published by the same author.

author.description: The WordPress.org username of the block author.

last_updated.description: The date when the block was last updated.

humanized_updated.description: The date when the block was last updated, in fuzzy human readable format.
